Operation 'get_/fact/categories' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Current description is misleading - it says 'Get a random Fact' but the endpoint path suggests it retrieves categories, not facts. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about purpose (discovering available categories), expected inputs (none), and output format (list of categories). Improved version clarifies the operation's true purpose and helps AI agents understand when to use it for category discovery.

data.current_description: Get a random Fact.
data.description_suggestion: Returns a list of all available fact categories that can be used with the Facts API. This operation helps AI agents discover which categories are supported for random fact retrieval, fact-of-the-day queries, and other category-based operations. No parameters required. Returns an array of category names/identifiers.
data.reasoning: Current description is misleading - it says 'Get a random Fact' but the endpoint path suggests it retrieves categories, not facts. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about purpose (discovering available categories), expected inputs (none), and output format (list of categories). Improved version clarifies the operation's true purpose and helps AI agents understand when to use it for category discovery.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/numbers' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't clarify whether a specific number can be provided or if it's always random. Missing information about expected inputs (optional number parameter), output structure (fact object), and use cases. Enhanced version provides clarity on input flexibility and output format for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Get a random fact about a number
data.description_suggestion: Returns a random interesting fact about a number. The operation can accept an optional number parameter to retrieve a fact about a specific number, or omit it to receive a fact about a randomly selected number. Returns a fact object containing the number and its associated interesting fact. Useful for trivia, educational content, or number-related queries.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't clarify whether a specific number can be provided or if it's always random. Missing information about expected inputs (optional number parameter), output structure (fact object), and use cases. Enhanced version provides clarity on input flexibility and output format for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/onthisday/born' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description uses informal parenthetical notation that could confuse AI agents. Lacks clarity on required parameters (day, month) versus optional ones, and doesn't explain the return object structure. Enhanced version clarifies parameter requirements, specifies that year is not needed, and describes the response format for better AI interpretability.

data.current_description: Returns a random ( famous/ relatively famous ) person born on a given day and month
data.summary_suggestion: Get famous person born on date
data.description_suggestion: Returns a random famous or relatively famous person born on a specified day and month. Requires day and month parameters (year is not required, allowing historical birth date queries). Returns a person object containing name, birth date, and biographical information. Useful for historical queries, birthday trivia, or on-this-day content generation.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description uses informal parenthetical notation that could confuse AI agents. Lacks clarity on required parameters (day, month) versus optional ones, and doesn't explain the return object structure. Enhanced version clarifies parameter requirements, specifies that year is not needed, and describes the response format for better AI interpretability.

data.current_description: Returns a random ( famous/ relatively famous ) person died on a given day and month
data.summary_suggestion: Get famous person who died on date
data.description_suggestion: Returns a random famous or relatively famous person who died on a specified day and month. Useful for historical queries, death anniversary trivia, or on-this-day content generation.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/onthisday/event' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description uses informal parenthetical notation inconsistent with professional API documentation. Lacks clarity on required parameters (day, month) versus optional ones, and doesn't explain the return object structure or what constitutes a 'historic event'. Enhanced version clarifies parameter requirements, specifies that year is not needed, and describes the response format for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Returns a random ( famous/ relatively famous ) historic event on a given day and month
data.description_suggestion: Returns a random famous or relatively famous historic event that occurred on a specified day and month. Requires day and month parameters (year is not required, allowing queries across multiple centuries). Returns an event object containing event description, date, and historical significance. Useful for historical queries, anniversary trivia, or on-this-day content generation.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description uses informal parenthetical notation inconsistent with professional API documentation. Lacks clarity on required parameters (day, month) versus optional ones, and doesn't explain the return object structure or what constitutes a 'historic event'. Enhanced version clarifies parameter requirements, specifies that year is not needed, and describes the response format for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/fact' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary entirely. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify that ID is required, doesn't clarify return format, and doesn't explain the distinction between public and private facts. AI agents need clarity on parameter requirements and response structure.

data.current_description: Get a Fact belonging to the id.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific fact entry from either the public or private collection using its unique identifier. Requires the fact ID as a parameter. Returns the complete fact object including content, category, and metadata. Supports both public random facts and private user-stored facts.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify that ID is required, doesn't clarify return format, and doesn't explain the distinction between public and private facts. AI agents need clarity on parameter requirements and response structure.

message: Operation 'put_/fact' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about required parameters, authentication requirement, return value structure, and access control implications. AI agents need to understand what inputs are required and what the operation returns.

data.current_description: Add a Fact entry to the database (private collection).
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new private fact entry
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new fact entry in the user's private collection. Requires authentication and accepts 4 parameters: fact content, category, subcategory, and optional metadata. Returns the newly created fact object with assigned ID and timestamp. The fact is immediately stored and accessible only to the authenticated user.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about required parameters, authentication requirement, return value structure, and access control implications. AI agents need to understand what inputs are required and what the operation returns.

message: Operation 'delete_/fact' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description doesn't specify authentication requirement, doesn't clarify that this affects private facts only, doesn't explain the permanent nature of deletion, and lacks return value details. AI agents need to understand the destructive nature and prerequisites.

data.current_description: Delete a Fact entry identified by the id.
data.description_suggestion: Permanently removes a fact entry from the user's private collection using its unique identifier. Requires authentication and the fact ID parameter. Returns a confirmation response. This action is irreversible - the deleted fact cannot be recovered.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description doesn't specify authentication requirement, doesn't clarify that this affects private facts only, doesn't explain the permanent nature of deletion, and lacks return value details. AI agents need to understand the destructive nature and prerequisites.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/fod' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description doesn't specify that category is required, doesn't explain the daily refresh behavior, and doesn't clarify the return format. AI agents need to understand parameter requirements and the temporal nature of this operation.

data.current_description: Get fact of the day for the given category.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve daily fact for a category
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current day's fact for a specified category from the fact of the day collection. Requires a category parameter (must be one of the supported categories from /fact/fod/categories). Returns a single fact object that is refreshed daily. The same fact is returned for all requests on the same calendar day.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description doesn't specify that category is required, doesn't explain the daily refresh behavior, and doesn't clarify the return format. AI agents need to understand parameter requirements and the temporal nature of this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/random' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description uses parenthetical notation which is unclear for AI agents. Needs explicit explanation that both parameters are truly optional and what happens when they're omitted. Should clarify that each call returns a different fact.

data.current_description: Get a random Fact for a given category(optional) and subcategory(optional).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a random fact with optional filters
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a random fact with optional filtering by category and subcategory. Both category and subcategory parameters are optional - if omitted, a fact from any category is returned. Returns a single fact object with content, category, and metadata. Each request returns a different random fact.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description uses parenthetical notation which is unclear for AI agents. Needs explicit explanation that both parameters are truly optional and what happens when they're omitted. Should clarify that each call returns a different fact.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/search' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is awkwardly phrased with parenthetical notation. Doesn't clearly specify that query is required, doesn't explain the search behavior (text matching), and doesn't clarify the random selection from matches. AI agents need clear parameter requirements and search semantics.

data.current_description: Search for random Fact which has the text in the query, for a given category(optional) and subcategory(optional).
data.summary_suggestion: Search facts by keyword with optional filters
data.description_suggestion: Searches for facts containing specified text in their content, with optional filtering by category and subcategory. Requires a query parameter containing the search text. Category and subcategory parameters are optional for narrowing results. Returns a random fact matching the search criteria. If multiple matches exist, one is returned randomly.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is awkwardly phrased with parenthetical notation. Doesn't clearly specify that query is required, doesn't explain the search behavior (text matching), and doesn't clarify the random selection from matches. AI agents need clear parameter requirements and search semantics.

Operation 'get_/fact/categories' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. Current description is misleading - it says 'Get a random Fact' but the endpoint path suggests it retrieves categories, not facts. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about purpose (discovering available categories), expected inputs (none), and output format (list of categories). Improved version clarifies the operation's true purpose and helps AI agents understand when to use it for category discovery.

data.current_description: Get a random Fact.
data.description_suggestion: Returns a list of all available fact categories that can be used with the Facts API. This operation helps AI agents discover which categories are supported for random fact retrieval, fact-of-the-day queries, and other category-based operations. No parameters required. Returns an array of category names/identifiers.
data.reasoning: Current description is misleading - it says 'Get a random Fact' but the endpoint path suggests it retrieves categories, not facts. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about purpose (discovering available categories), expected inputs (none), and output format (list of categories). Improved version clarifies the operation's true purpose and helps AI agents understand when to use it for category discovery.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/numbers' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't clarify whether a specific number can be provided or if it's always random. Missing information about expected inputs (optional number parameter), output structure (fact object), and use cases. Enhanced version provides clarity on input flexibility and output format for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Get a random fact about a number
data.description_suggestion: Returns a random interesting fact about a number. The operation can accept an optional number parameter to retrieve a fact about a specific number, or omit it to receive a fact about a randomly selected number. Returns a fact object containing the number and its associated interesting fact. Useful for trivia, educational content, or number-related queries.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't clarify whether a specific number can be provided or if it's always random. Missing information about expected inputs (optional number parameter), output structure (fact object), and use cases. Enhanced version provides clarity on input flexibility and output format for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/onthisday/born' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description uses informal notation '( famous/ relatively famous )' which is unclear. Missing information about output structure and practical use cases. Enhanced version clarifies parameter requirements (day/month only, no year needed), output format, and helps AI agents understand when to invoke this operation for historical birth information.

data.current_description: Returns a random ( famous/ relatively famous ) person born on a given day and month
data.summary_suggestion: Get famous person born on date
data.description_suggestion: Returns a random famous or relatively famous person born on a specified day and month. Requires day and month parameters (year is not required, allowing retrieval of historical births across any year). Returns a person object containing name, birth date, and biographical information. Useful for historical queries, birthday trivia, or 'on this day' features.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description uses informal notation '( famous/ relatively famous )' which is unclear. Missing information about output structure and practical use cases. Enhanced version clarifies parameter requirements (day/month only, no year needed), output format, and helps AI agents understand when to invoke this operation for historical birth information.

data.current_description: Returns a random ( famous/ relatively famous ) historic event on a given day and month

message: Operation 'get_/fact' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary entirely. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify that ID is required, doesn't clarify return format, and doesn't explain the distinction between public and private facts. AI agents need clarity on parameter requirements and response structure.

data.current_description: Get a Fact belonging to the id.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific fact entry from either the public or private collection using its unique identifier. Requires the fact ID as a parameter. Returns the complete fact object including content, category, and metadata. Supports both public random facts and private user-stored facts.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify that ID is required, doesn't clarify return format, and doesn't explain the distinction between public and private facts. AI agents need clarity on parameter requirements and response structure.

message: Operation 'put_/fact' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about required parameters, authentication requirement, return value structure, and access control implications. AI agents need to understand what inputs are required and what the operation returns.

data.current_description: Add a Fact entry to the database (private collection).
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new private fact entry
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new fact entry in the user's private collection. Requires authentication and accepts 4 parameters: fact content, category, subcategory, and optional metadata. Returns the newly created fact object with assigned ID and timestamp. The fact is immediately stored and accessible only to the authenticated user.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about required parameters, authentication requirement, return value structure, and access control implications. AI agents need to understand what inputs are required and what the operation returns.

message: Operation 'delete_/fact' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description doesn't specify authentication requirement, doesn't clarify that this affects private facts only, doesn't explain the permanent nature of deletion, and lacks return value details. AI agents need to understand the destructive nature and prerequisites.

data.current_description: Delete a Fact entry identified by the id.
data.description_suggestion: Permanently removes a fact entry from the user's private collection using its unique identifier. Requires authentication and the fact ID parameter. Returns a confirmation response. This action is irreversible - the deleted fact cannot be recovered.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description doesn't specify authentication requirement, doesn't clarify that this affects private facts only, doesn't explain the permanent nature of deletion, and lacks return value details. AI agents need to understand the destructive nature and prerequisites.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/fod' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description doesn't specify that category is required, doesn't explain the daily refresh behavior, and doesn't clarify the return format. AI agents need to understand parameter requirements and the temporal nature of this operation.

data.current_description: Get fact of the day for the given category.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve daily fact for a category
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current day's fact for a specified category from the fact of the day collection. Requires a category parameter (must be one of the supported categories from /fact/fod/categories). Returns a single fact object that is refreshed daily. The same fact is returned for all requests on the same calendar day.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description doesn't specify that category is required, doesn't explain the daily refresh behavior, and doesn't clarify the return format. AI agents need to understand parameter requirements and the temporal nature of this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/random' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description uses parenthetical notation which is unclear for AI agents. Needs explicit explanation that both parameters are truly optional and what happens when they're omitted. Should clarify that each call returns a different fact.

data.current_description: Get a random Fact for a given category(optional) and subcategory(optional).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a random fact with optional filters
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a random fact with optional filtering by category and subcategory. Both category and subcategory parameters are optional - if omitted, a fact from any category is returned. Returns a single fact object with content, category, and metadata. Each request returns a different random fact.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description uses parenthetical notation which is unclear for AI agents. Needs explicit explanation that both parameters are truly optional and what happens when they're omitted. Should clarify that each call returns a different fact.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/search' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is awkwardly phrased with parenthetical notation. Doesn't clearly specify that query is required, doesn't explain the search behavior (text matching), and doesn't clarify the random selection from matches. AI agents need clear parameter requirements and search semantics.

data.current_description: Search for random Fact which has the text in the query, for a given category(optional) and subcategory(optional).
data.summary_suggestion: Search facts by keyword with optional filters
data.description_suggestion: Searches for facts containing specified text in their content, with optional filtering by category and subcategory. Requires a query parameter containing the search text. Category and subcategory parameters are optional for narrowing results. Returns a random fact matching the search criteria. If multiple matches exist, one is returned randomly.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is awkwardly phrased with parenthetical notation. Doesn't clearly specify that query is required, doesn't explain the search behavior (text matching), and doesn't clarify the random selection from matches. AI agents need clear parameter requirements and search semantics.
